<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.14</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of objects attached to the given object. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''attachedObjects''' obj </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]] - given object </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s attached to the given object</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
  [[detach]] _x;
} [[forEach]] [[attachedObjects]] [[player]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[count]] [[attachedObjects]] [[player]] == 0) [[then]] {
  [[hint]] "There are no objects attached to player";
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[attachObject]], [[attachTo]], [[attachedTo]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[triggerAttachVehicle]], [[attachedObject]], [[detach]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
